sentences.en: To edit it, you need to run the built-in Windows Registry editor.
sentences.cn: 要编辑，就需要启动内置的视窗注册编辑程序。

sentences.en: The majority have a built-in Luddite mentality; they are resistant to change.
sentences.cn: 绝大部分人天生都有反对技术进步的心理，他们是抗拒变革的。

sentences.en: The object of great interest at the temple was a large marble tower built in memory of Buddha.
sentences.cn: 那庙里使人极感兴趣的东西是一座为纪念佛陀而修建的大理石巨塔。
